intro: Randia andongensis, commonly known as the Andong randia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It produces small, round fruits that are typically red when mature. Randia andongensis is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
